name: menlo-security-link-protector
description: Cross-browser extension that adds Menlo Security prefix to links

scripts.dev:chrome: npm run prepare:chrome && npx web-ext run --source-dir=dist/chrome
scripts.build:firefox: npx web-ext build --source-dir=. --artifacts-dir=dist --filename=menlo-security-firefox-{version}.zip --ignore-files=dist/ node_modules/ .git/ .DS_Store manifest-chrome.json package*.json build.sh
scripts.build:chrome: npm run prepare:chrome && npx web-ext build --source-dir=dist/chrome --artifacts-dir=dist --filename=menlo-security-chrome-{version}.zip
scripts.prepare:chrome: rm -rf dist/chrome && mkdir -p dist/chrome && rsync -av --exclude='dist/' --exclude='node_modules/' --exclude='.git/' --exclude='.DS_Store' --exclude='package*.json' --exclude='build.sh' --exclude='manifest-chrome.json' . dist/chrome/ && cp manifest-chrome.json dist/chrome/manifest.json
scripts.build:all: npm run build:firefox && npm run build:chrome

author: Menlo Security
